extendedInfo.description: ** Please uninstall old versions (< 5.0.0) first! **â SocialBind (formerly FBTouch) is the BEST and FREE Facebook Mobile client app for Android packed with extra features lacked in other apps! ââ SocialBind brings you to the next level, fast, and simple Facebook experience. ââ The 5th version of SocialBind has been rewritten for better performance and tons of features with more available languages! ââ This is the next generation of the original popular FbTouch, FbTouch X, FbTouch XT, FbTouch HD, and FBTouch 4! âTip 1 â You can hide the ad banner by clicking it on each launch!Tip 2 â You can change menu language by pressing MENU --> Preferences --> Language (You must exit app and open it again to completely change to the selected language.)âââââ Great Features! âââââ+ Code rewrite for better performance!+ Support Android 4.0 ICS Holo Theme+ Support notifications+ Support Check-Ins+ Can launch Facebook Messenger and Go!Chat+ Scroll page using volume key+ Fullscreen toggle+ Search button shortcut+ Automatically launch YouTube app from YouTube video links+ Launch links on a web browser+ Save image (Long touch on an image)+ Photo uploading+ Multilingual menu (Chinese, English, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Portugese, and Spanish)+ Clear cache+ App2SD

reviews.title: Ok, except the typing
reviews.comment: The Swype does not work properly. No capitals at beginning is sentences and no spaces between words.

reviews.comment: As soon as i tried to log in right after downloading it was already force closing... smh.. no choice but to uninstall.

reviews.comment: Apps is good but photo is not uploading .plz fix it then it will be an awesome apps unless very poor .in this reason I ..... when upload a photo the apps automatically stop and photo not upload .what is the reason plz tell me .

reviews.comment: Stuck on logon screen. Fml.

reviews.title: Soooo good
reviews.comment: This is unlike any other Facebook application i ve used.  Its simply the best in all ways.

reviews.title: Seamless connectivity as it promises
reviews.comment: Great app works smoothly on my nexus.plus liked d placement of smiley selection on the top
reviews.author: daniel vittory

reviews.title: So glad I got this!
reviews.comment: Really great useful and helpful app that I use every day. Helps me use Facebook more effectively! Has a solid layout that is quick and easy to use. Saves phone memory too. Really recommend this to all Facebook users. Thank you so much developer!
reviews.author: Nick Davies

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: This is the best Facebook client I\'ve ever tried on my phone. Works fast and flawlessly, no any problems with it yet! Highly recommended for all Facebook users.
reviews.author: Maria Garcia

reviews.title: Quick, easy and practical.
reviews.comment: Recently haven\'t had signal as I have been in Cornwall so this App has been fantastic! So easy to use and good for going abroad.
reviews.author: Andrew Shames

reviews.title: The Best Facebook App In The Market!
reviews.comment: This is by far the most fully customizable Facebook app I\'ve tried. It is fast, clean, and have full featured Facebook, from user to page management. I just hope that the next release will add more custom themes for it, expecially dark!
reviews.author: Stuart Broad

reviews.title: Impressed!
reviews.comment: Pretty good and fast I have no issues with it, works so much better than the official FB app. 10 stars good going Dev!!
reviews.author: Sandra Morris

reviews.title: Thank you!
reviews.comment: Finally FB app that I can move to SD card. This is a must have app if u use Facebook, and especially for those with older phones with small internal memory. Great replacement for the default FB app!
reviews.author: Timothy Walker

reviews.comment: SocialBind iss working clasically , I am getting addicted of it reaalyy addiction in it

reviews.title: dependable man!
reviews.comment: This if by far the most dependable and user friendly service I\'ve used i.e its easy to upload phtos too n faster.

reviews.title: Replica of fb mobile website
reviews.comment: Guys who saying we are not getting notifications,because it just the replica of facebook mobile website,u won\'t get notifications..

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Finally I found good (the best) Facebook app that really works as it should... User friendly UI, easy to use and many extra features. A must try!
